objectives.good: >=2 Captains of Arnor are alive after 12 turns
objectives.evil: slay all Captains of Arnor w/in 12 turns

specialRules.Legions of the Witch-king: Slain Evil Warriors return on 4+ from the east edge or the center of the north or south edges
specialRules.Hold the Line: Good models must stay w/in 12" of the center of the board
specialRules.Unknown Attackers: Arnor models do not have Hatred (Angmar)
